channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Flamingos create water tornados to trap their prey

item.title: Universe decays faster than thought, but still takes a long time
item.description: The universe is decaying much faster than thought. This is shown by calculations of scientists on the so-called Hawking radiation. They calculate that...

item.title: From prehistoric resident to runaway pet: First tegu fossil found in the U.S.

item.title: Submarine robot catches an underwater wave
item.description: Engineers have taught a simple submarine robot to take advantage of turbulent forces to propel itself through water.
